description:
They may have a victory under their belts, but the Kisaragi girls have yet to prove their worth in the eyes of the baseball committee.  If the girls can beat Rinkai High, one of the best teams in the country, only then will they be allowed in the league!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nous visons le tournoi des lycées !
私たちは甲子園をめざす!
